UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Analogs of the Cathelicidin-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide PMAP-23 Exhibit Improved Stability and Antibacterial Activity.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Shen T, Chen L, Zhou J, Wang C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<4% Hemolysis=1000 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:<10% Killing=500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.025µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis LY8(MIC=25µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CICC 21533(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis CICC 24434(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis C78-1(MIC=0.78µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida C48-3(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Escherichia coli E44813(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Shigella flexneri CICC 21534(MIC=75µg/ml)
